[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@svelte-put/avatar](./avatar.md) &gt; [AvatarProps](./avatar.avatarprops.md)

## AvatarProps interface

Props to Avatar component

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface AvatarProps extends HTMLImgAttributes 
```
**Extends:** HTMLImgAttributes

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [alt?](./avatar.avatarprops.alt.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ value for "alt" attribute of <img>. Default to uiAvatar.name or gravatar.email if any. Will have no effect if default slot is overridden |
|  [class?](./avatar.avatarprops.class.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ |
|  [fallback?](./avatar.avatarprops.fallback.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The fallback url string. This option takes lowest priority. It defaults to the internal fallback (https://www.gravatar.com/avatar?d=mp). If you provide a different url that is not a valid resource, the internal fallback will be used. |
|  [gravatar?](./avatar.avatarprops.gravatar.md) |  | [GravatarOptions](./avatar.gravataroptions.md) \| string | _(Optional)_ Either the email for [Gravatar](https://en.gravatar.com/site/implement/images) or [GravatarOptions](./avatar.gravataroptions.md) object. This option take second priority. |
|  [size?](./avatar.avatarprops.size.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ value for "width" &amp; "height" attribute of <img>. Will have no effect if default slot is overridden |
|  [src?](./avatar.avatarprops.src.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ "src" attribute. This option is of highest priority |
|  [uiAvatar?](./avatar.avatarprops.uiavatar.md) |  | string \| [UIAvatarOptions](./avatar.uiavataroptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Either the name for building initials with [UIAvatar](https://ui-avatars.com) or [UIAvatarOptions](./avatar.uiavataroptions.md) object. This option take third priority. |
